column4: how do i change graphic card config before login into gnome? i can't access the safemode, my keyboard cant be used.
boot into recovery mode and do 'sudo dpkg-reconfigure -phigh xserver-xorg'
'sudo dpkg-reconfigure -phigh xserver-xorg' returns 'xserver-xorg postinst warning: overwritting possibly-customized  config... '
that means it generated a new xorg.conf that was what you wanted; no?
yea, thanks it saved my eyes from fuzzy screen now.
i'm having a ATI radeon X300. I install a ATI package from the add/remove, it doesn't work properly.
